Description: Ragged fragment, mainly undyed cotton, decorated with scattered brocaded geometric motifs of red and dark blue wool. Motifs include paired triangles joined at the apex flanked by vertical bars; bars of lozenges; bars of three 'Y' form, the centre one inverted. Crudely repaired and patched with a piece of the same cloth.
Acquisition name: Division of Finds: Egyptian Antiquities Organisation
